Title:
Brother SC6600 sewing machine (in original box) - $65
         @stanford.edu
Description:
Sewing machine, excellent condition in original box, manual, foot pedal, and cover. Was serviced by Brother before being stored in the box.


ABOUT THE PRODUCT


The SC6600 computerized sewing machine features 60 unique built in stitches, including utility, decorative, quilting and heirloom stitches. Selecting your stitch is easy with the push-button controls, and the LCD display screen allows you to then view your stitch selection. This user-friendly sewing machine features a Quick-set bobbin system for easy bobbin setting, an advanced needle threading system, variable needle positions and drop feed for free motion quilting.


Main Features


60 unique built-in stitches

LCD display screen with computerized stitch selection

7 Styles of 1-step auto-size buttonholes

Brightly lit LED work area

Advanced needle threading system

Quick-Set drop-in top bobbin for fast and easy bobbin setting
